lore.wizards_reborn.reproduction_banner_: The chains of constant lust have shrouded this world...
lore.wizards_reborn.hunger_banner_patter: The hunter cannot become the hunted.
gui.wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.title: Arcanemicon
gui.wizards_reborn.jeweler_table.title: Jeweler Table
gui.wizards_reborn.alchemy_furnace.title: Alchemy Furnace
gui.wizards_reborn.alchemy_machine.title: Alchemy Machine
gui.wizards_reborn.item_sorter.title: Item Sorter
gui.wizards_reborn.runic_pedestal.title: Runic Pedestal
gui.wizards_reborn.menu.optifine.0: ATTENTION! It seems you have Optifine installed
gui.wizards_reborn.menu.optifine.1: Optifine can break the render of particles in Wizard's Reborn
message.wizards_reborn.arcanemicon_offer: My strength is fading... I give you this book for you to revive lost knowledge! Accomplish this great goal, for I have not...
message.wizards_reborn.arcanemicon: The zeal for ancient knowledge begins to blossom inside you! You know what you should do.
commands.wizards_reborn.knowledge.unknow: No knowledge exists with the ID '%s'
commands.wizards_reborn.spell.unknown: No spell exists with the ID '%s'
commands.wizards_reborn.arcane_enchantme: No arcane enchantment exists with the ID '%s'
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcanum: Ancient crystals can be found underground caves, containing a primordial power of a sacred knowledge, called "wissen" capable of transforming matter.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcanum_: Due to its powerful magical properties, arcanum dust is capable of transforming objects into completely new ones, saturated with magical energy.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_w: Arcane Wood Sapling
Transmuting an oak sapling turns it into an arcane wood sapling.
Arcane Wood
Dark wood imbued with the magical energy of wissen.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_g:
The transmutation of gold allows it to conduct and retain wissen. 
 Used for most mechanism's.

Improved golden tools. 
 
 They are not useless.
Sloppy gold armor. It could become something big.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.scythes: A tool used for harvesting crops. Also, because of it's long handle, it allows you to deal damage from a long distance.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.trinkets:
Small decorations that slightly improve your stats. 
 
 You look beautiful in them UwU
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_w: Arcane Wood Bow
Adding arcane gold to the hilt of a bow makes it much stronger.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.banner_p:
Quite strange banner patterns. 
 
 These symbols remind me of rainy days...
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wissen: Primordial magical power that can take the form of light ether. With its help, you can bring to life various magical mechanism's.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wissen_w: A wand for debugging your wissen mechanism's. Has five different modes.
Mode for receiving wissen via wissen translator. To connect, you need to select the mechanism from which you want to take the wissen, then the wissen translator.
Mode for sending wissen via wissen translator. To connect, you need to select the mechanism to which you want to send wissen, then the wissen translator.
Mode for resetting wissen translator connections.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wissen_t: A mechanism for creating wissen networks. Capable of receiving and sending wissen. When a redstone signal is given, it stops working.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_p: Decorative pedestal for items. You can place your relics on it.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wissen_a: The wissen altar is capable of releasing primordial wissen energy from arcanum and arcanum dust.
Used to charge items with wissen.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wissen_c: A mechanism that is capable of crystallizing wissen. Used to create crystals and other magical items.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_w: Arcane Workbench
Advanced workbench, with additional slots. Uses wissen for crafting.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_l:
A bunch of wissen emitting light. 
 A bit weird...
Able to change the color of the wissen translator
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.crystal_: Crystallization of the arcanum together with elemental items creates a special magical stone capable of growing on it's own.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.crystals: During growth, the seed will change its crystal lattice, which changes the properties of the grown crystal in various ways.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.fracture: When collecting crystals, extra small pieces may break off from them. They can be reunited into a large crystal.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_w: Arcane Wand

The main tool of a wizard. 
 With it, using the crystal as a lens, the wizard is able to refract the energy of the wissen, releasing true magical power.
The menu for selecting crystals and spells can be called up by pressing the [wizards_reborn:wandMenu] button while holding the wand in your hands.
Focus
The "Focus" crystal's characteristic affects the power of the spell.
Balance
The "Balance" crystal's characteristic affects the consumption of wissen when using a spell
Absorption
The "Absorption" crystal's characteristic affects the cooldown of the spell.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.automati: Mechanisms that will help you automate your other mechanisms.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.redstone: Miniature redstone comparator. Capable of reading a signal from any direction.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wissen_s: Reads the wissen in the block and converts it into a redstone signal.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.cooldown: Reads the cooldown in the block and converts it into a redstone signal.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.experien: Reads the experience in the block and converts it into a redstone signal.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.light_se: Reads the presence of a light ray in the block and converts it into a redstone signal.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.heat_sen: Reads the heat in the block and converts it into a redstone signal.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.fluid_se: Reads the amount of fluid in the block and converts it into a redstone signal. It is also able to check the type of fluid. When pressed, it switches to inversion mode.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.steam_se: Reads the steam in the block and converts it into a redstone signal.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wissen_a: Works like the functional mode of the wissen wand. Activated when a redstone signal is applied.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.item_sor: Places selected items in the required storage slots. Takes items from storage behind the sorter itself.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_w: Arcane Wood Frame
Beautiful holey block made of arcane wood.
Arcane Wood Casing
The basis for interesting mechanisms made of arcane wood.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wissen_c: Distributes wissen evenly in all directions. It is adjusted with a wissen wand. When a redstone signal is given, it stops working.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wiseston: Beautiful holey block made of wisestone.
The basis for interesting mechanisms made of wisestone.
Distributes wissen evenly in all directions. It is adjusted with a wissen wand. When a redstone signal is given, it stops working.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_w: Arcane Wood Fluid Casing
Fluid pipe in a arcane wood casing. When pressed, it switches to uniform distribution mode. When a redstone signal is given, it stops working.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wiseston: Fluid pipe in a wisestone casing. When pressed, it switches to uniform distribution mode. When a redstone signal is given, it stops working.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_w: Wood Steam Casing
Steam pipe in a arcane wood casing. When pressed, it switches to uniform distribution mode. When a redstone signal is given, it stops working.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wiseston: Steam pipe in a wisestone casing. When pressed, it switches to uniform distribution mode. When a redstone signal is given, it stops working.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_w: Arcane Wood Glass Frame
Arcane wood frame with alchemy glass inserts.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wiseston: Wisestone frame with alchemy glass inserts.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_w: Arcane Wood Light Casing
Separates light rays in all directions without loss. It is adjusted with a wissen wand. When a redstone signal is given, it stops working.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wiseston: Separates light rays in all directions without loss. It is adjusted with a wissen wand. When a redstone signal is given, it stops working.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.innocent: Beautiful holey block made of innocent wood.
The basis for interesting mechanisms made of innocent wood.
Distributes wissen evenly in all directions. It is adjusted with a wissen wand. When a redstone signal is given, it stops working.
Fluid pipe in a innocent wood casing. When pressed, it switches to uniform distribution mode. When a redstone signal is given, it stops working.
Steam pipe in a innocent wood casing. When pressed, it switches to uniform distribution mode. When a redstone signal is given, it stops working.
Innocent wood frame with alchemy glass inserts.
Separates light rays in all directions without loss. It is adjusted with a wissen wand. When a redstone signal is given, it stops working.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wissen_c: Small wissen storage. Unlike other wissen mechanism's, it is capable of retaining wissen when destroyed.
Used to charge items with wissen and transport wissen.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.crystal_: Bag for storing crystals. Hold down the [minecraft:sneak] button to open the bag. Additionally, the bag can be opened by pressing the [wizards_reborn:openAlchemyBag] button.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.totem_of: A decorative totem that emits flames using lumos. Place on a arcane pedestal.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.experien: A totem for storing a small amount of experience. Place on a arcane pedestal.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.totem_of: Converts experience into wissen. Place on a arcane pedestal.
Removes certain enchantments from an item and converts them into wissen. Place on a arcane pedestal.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.altar_of: Dries the leaves of arcane trees to process them into wissen. When a redstone signal is given, it stops working.

In a barren desert, the scanty land, 
 
 On a ground, burned by sun to total, 
 
 Anchar, as one of the safeguards stand 
 
 Alone in this endless world.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.void_cry:
The Void Crystal Seed combines the four elements. 
 
 What secrets can he keep within himself?
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_f: Armor made of dense arcane gold plates. Has high knockback resistance.
Belt with a large arcane gold plate. Grants great knockback resistance.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.inventor:
Elegant British costume a inventor wizard. Gives a wissen discount and magic armor. 
 
 This hat is just right for me
A full set of armor improves the performance of many spells, and even adds unique effects.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_w: Arcane Wood Cane
A beautiful cane that increases walking speed when worn.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_i: The arcane iterator is an interesting structure capable of creating and enchanting items.
Activated if placed above the arcane pedestal through one block. Uses items from nearby pedestals, your experience and even health for the iteration process!
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_e: Special enchantments that can only be applied to arcane items. They spend wissen from accessories for work.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wissen_m: Slowly repairing an item using wissen.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.magic_bl: Chance to enhance the hit with magical damage.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_i: An alternative way to obtain regular enchantments.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcanum_: Wissen in a glass shell. Breaking it will release some wissen into your items.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wissen_k: Large portable wissen storage. Gradually fills active accessories and items with wissen.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wissen_r: Passively generates small amounts of wissen. Gradually fills accessories and objects with wissen.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.jeweler_: The fast rotating arcacite grindstone is capable of polishing items quickly and easily
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.faceted_: Polishing improves the refractive properties of crystals. They are now able to unleash the power of stronger spells
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.music_di:
"Eternal peace fills you with determination. You leave everything behind and take a new step..." 
 
 Onjerlay - Reborn
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.earth_pr: A concentrated wissen projectile that deals physical damage.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.water_pr: A concentrated projectile of wissen that causes suffocation. Puts out the fire.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.air_proj: A concentrated wissen projectile that deals fall damage.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.fire_pro: A concentrated wissen projectile that sets enemies on fire.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.void_pro: A concentrated wissen projectile that deals magic damage.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.frost_pr: A concentrated wissen projectile that freezes enemies.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.holy_pro: A concentrated wissen projectile that restores health. Deals damage to undead.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.curse_pr: A concentrated wissen projectile that restores health to undead.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.earth_ra: A bright ray of wissen that deals physical damage. Hold down the [minecraft:sneak] button for additional effect.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.water_ra: A bright ray of wissen that causes suffocation. Puts out the fire. Hold down the [minecraft:sneak] button for additional effect.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.air_ray: A bright ray of wissen that deals fall damage. Hold down the [minecraft:sneak] button for additional effect.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.fire_ray: A bright ray of wissen that sets enemies on fire. Hold down the [minecraft:sneak] button for additional effect.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.void_ray: A bright ray of wissen that deals magic damage.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.frost_ra: A bright ray of wissen that freezes enemies. Hold down the [minecraft:sneak] button for additional effect.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.holy_ray: A bright ray of wissen that restores health. Deals damage to undead. Hold down the [minecraft:sneak] button for additional effect.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.curse_ra: A bright ray of wissen that restores health to undead. Hold down the [minecraft:sneak] button for additional effect.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.earth_ch: Chargeable wissen projectile. The strength of the effect depends on the power of the charge. Deals physical damage.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.water_ch: Chargeable wissen projectile. The strength of the effect depends on the power of the charge. Causes suffocation.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.air_char: Chargeable wissen projectile. The strength of the effect depends on the power of the charge. Deals fall damage
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.fire_cha: Chargeable wissen projectile. The strength of the effect depends on the power of the charge. Sets fire.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.void_cha: Chargeable wissen projectile. The strength of the effect depends on the power of the charge. Deals magic damage.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.frost_ch: Chargeable wissen projectile. The strength of the effect depends on the power of the charge. Freezes.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.holy_cha: Chargeable wissen projectile. The strength of the effect depends on the power of the charge. Restores health. Deals damage to undead.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.curse_ch: Chargeable wissen projectile. The strength of the effect depends on the power of the charge. Restores health to undead.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.air_flow:
The air flow is pushing in the direction of view. 
 
 Don't look up.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.magic_sp: Grows plants. Hold the [minecraft:sneak] button for an area effect.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.research: To research a spell, you need to lay out a chain of monograms of a certain length.  To complete the chain and consider it as finished, all monograms must be connected. The connection is counted clockwise.
Research spends points that are awarded for gaining knowledge.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.lunam_mo:
Friend of the night and the Earth. 
 
 so close and so far...
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.vita_mon:
The fleeting flutter of a butterfly is only a moment for you. 
 
 ...Is everything forever?.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.solem_mo:
Majestic luminary. The progenitor of life on Earth. 
 
 It will eat us all.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.mors_mon:
You see in front of you the lid of a rotten coffin. There is damp earth around... 
 
 There's no time to just lie down. GET OUT!!!
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.miraculu:
A sparkling desire will rise up... 
 
 We all know that there is no such thing as magic.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.tempus_m:
Time inexorably runs forward, forever erasing the past. 
 
 I do not have time for anything...
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.statera_:
Yin and Yang. Perfect balance 
 
 ...and just one grain of sand can destroy everything..
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.eclipsis:
Light gives way to darkness. And only a bloody halo is visible in the sky. 
 
 Only once every hundred years
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.siccitas:
Endless scorched wastelands... 
 
 We only have a box of matches and two bells.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.solstiti:
The earth is illuminated by sunlight. But now it's winter! 
 
 give me glasses
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.fames_mo:
The crops are rotting. The remaining bread crumbs are covered in mold. 
 
 Maybe I should start eating wood.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.renaissa:
The legendary phoenix dies and is reborn from the ashes. 
 
 The wizard is being reborn right now!
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.bellum_m:
Endless aimless battles.. For what? 
 
 ...THE GREAT INDICTION IS COMING!
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.lux_mono:
Hill. Flower meadow. Clear sky. 
 
 Life is Beautiful?
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.kara_mon:
Volcanic eruptions, floods, hurricanes, earthquakes... 
 
 Everyone will answer for their sins...
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.degradat:
Irreversible decline of life. 
 
 Is this really happening around me?
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.praedict:
Nothing is accidental... EVERYTHING is subject to laws.. 
 
 Your niÃ°era ontihting reordian weorÃ°an... "What?"
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.evolutio:
Development from primordial soup to dinosaur. 
 
 You are a plant!
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.tenebris:
Forest. Pitch darkness. 
 
 Who could be hiding behind your back?
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.universu:
Huge endless expanses.. They have everything.. both good... and evil.. 
 
 Are you ready to accept the world as it is?
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.light_ra: Light concentrated with wissen. It is directed from lens to lens.
The ray can fade. therefore, it will not be possible to create very long chains of lenses.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.light_em: Concentrates light rays through constant consumption of wissen. When a redstone signal is given, it stops working.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.light_tr: Lens made of arcanum and alchemy glass to redirect the light ray. When a redstone signal is given, it stops working.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.runic_pe: A conductor of energy from a runic wisestone plate into a crystal.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.crystal_: The ritual works by sending a light ray into the crystal. To start, you need to place the desired crystal on the runic pedestal.
The ritual is started by click the wissen wand with a functional mode. And it turns off with reload mode. Some rituals require items on pedestals to start.
Directs a light ray into a growing crystal and greatly accelerates its growth.
Converts items with pedestals into a single whole..
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcanum_: Growing Arcanum using Arcanum. The cycle of Arcanum in nature.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.petals_o: White clean petals. They exude tenderness.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.innocent: An innocent wood sapling created using crystal infusion is not ready to bring destruction to the world.
Light wood impregnated with shiny resin.

A mortar made of innocent wood. 
 
 Destruction for redemption...
Soft bedding for your items. They look cute.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.mor.0: Found in the dark recesses of marshy areas, mor is a species of mushroom with distinct alchemical characteristics.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.mor.1: In addition, if used incorrectly or excessively, it can have a hallucinogenic effect.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.mortar: A arcane wood mortar and pestle is used for pounding various plants. Hold items in both hands to interact.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.petals: Crushed flower petals. Used in alchemy.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.ground_m: Mushrooms pounded in a mortar. Used in alchemy.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_l: A magical plant with crystal seeds. Used in alchemy as a catalyst.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.mushroom:
Decorative headdresses in the form of mushroom caps. 
 
 NOW YOU ARE A MUSHROOM!!!
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wiseston: Dark artificial stone. Well suited for creating alchemy containers.
A more elegant wisestone pedestal. Now your relics look more magnificent.
Hovering knowledge on an elegant stand.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.fluid_pi: They move fluids between themselves. Using a wissen wand, you can configure connections. Using the reload mode you can unclog it.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.fluid_ex: Retrieves fluid from storage and moves it through pipes. Activated by redstone. When clicked, it switches to inversion mode.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.steam_pi: They move steam between themselves. Using a wissen wand, you can configure connections. Using the reload mode you can unclog it.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.steam_ex: Retrieves steam from storage and moves it through pipes. Activated by redstone. When clicked, it switches to inversion mode.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.orbital_: The orbital fluid retainer has a strong gravitational field that is capable of holding fluids.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.alchemy_: A mechanism for converting water into steam. Retains heat for a long time. Can be used as a regular furnace to melt down items.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.steam_th: Steam-thermal storage, thanks to the thermal element, can preserve steam in its original state.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.alchemy_: The main mechanism in alchemy. Able to transform items and fluids using steam.
Oil squeezed from arcane linen and petals. Used in many alchemy recipes. Tastes like dirt.
The boiler is needed to operate the alchemy machine. Installed from above. May contain steam, wissen and the resulting fluid.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.music_di:
"Your magical mechanisms are hard at work transmitting the wissen. You are sitting in a chair and sipping tea." 
 
 Onjerlay - Arcanum Swinging

"There is a damp aroma in the air. Your ears are caressed by the croaking of frogs. Mushrooms are growing abundantly after yesterday's rain..." 
 
 Onjerlay - Mor Marsh
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.alchemy_: Ground quartz and calcium. Used in alchemy to enhance the reaction of reagents.
Glass coated with a layer of alchemy oil. Light color, but does not transmit light.
A vial made of alchemy glass capable of containing fluids and potions. You can take as many as three sips.
Bag for storing potions and bottles. Hold down the [minecraft:sneak] button to open the bag. Additionally, the bag can be opened by pressing the [wizards_reborn:openAlchemyBag] button.
The alchemy machine can brew long-lasting potions. All potions are based on a mundane brew.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.oil_tea: Alchemy oil tea? It doesn't taste great, but it increases your strength and regeneration.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.wissen_t: Tea with light notes of wissen. Gives wissen discount and magic armor. It also slowly accumulates wissen in your items.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.alchemy_: Unique potions can be brewed from various alchemy brews.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.advanced: Advanced calx are designed to enhance specific reactions.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.alchemy_: Alchemical mixtures of brews and calx allow you to create items using alternative recipes. Transmutation reaches a new level.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcane_c: The heating element of the censer turns items into smoke with effects using a little steam.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.smoking_: Portable censer that does not use steam. However, the smoke effect is much shorter. Hold item and tube in both hands to place item.
wizards_reborn.arcanemicon.page.arcacite: Thanks to its altered structure through alchemy, arcacite is stronger than arcanum. However, its refractive properties have faded.
Arcacite trinkets can slowly restore health in exchange for wissen.
A rough, solid mixture of alchemy oil, arcacite, and arcanum dust, ideal for polishing crystals.
